Translations.Text: Ur qqaoet mmuten wid ipwan$an deg ubrid n Oebbi. Xaii d imuddiren, maca ur teeuim ara
War ccekk, a kwen Njeooeb s kra usigwed, n llae, n nneqs n wayla, n leowae, n l$ellat. Ssefree iueboiyen
Wid, ma u$en tawa$it, qqaoen: "nekwni n Oebbi, nekwni, a nu$al $uoeS
Widak, fellasen teilla s$uo Mass nnsen, akked ueunu. Widak d wid ipwanhan
Ih, UUafa akked Meowa, seg isekkiren n Oebbi. Win ieuoen s Axxam, ne$ ieuo it, ulac u$ilif fellas, ma izzi yasent. Yif it win izzin, s leb$i s. Ih, Oebbi Ippara tajmilt, d Amusnaw
Ih, wid iteffren ayen id Nessers ubeggen akked nnhaya, mbaad ma Nbeggen it i yimdanen, di Tezmamt, widak, Ixza iten Oebbi, xzan ten wid ixezzun
Kkes ed wid inedmen u xedmen ayen ilhan, u beggnen d. Widak, ad asen Ssurfe$. Nek Ssurufe$, Peunu
Ih, wid ijehlen u mmuten d ijehliyen, widak, fellasen xezzu n Oebbi, lmalayek, akked yimdanen, meooa
Degs ad wekkoen. Ur ippifsus fellasen uaaqeb, ur illi w ara ten id iwalin
Oebbi nnwen d Oebbi Yiwen. Ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa, Aenin Ipeunun
